property.name: hive.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: List of ZooKeeper servers to talk to. This is needed for: 1. Read/write locks - when hive.lock.manager is set to org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr.zookeeper.ZooKeeperHiveLockManager, 2. When HiveServer2 supports service discovery via Zookeeper. 3. For delegation token storage if zookeeper store is used, if hive.cluster.delegation.token.store.zookeeper.connectString is not set

property.name: hive.zookeeper.session.timeout
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is msec if not specified. ZooKeeper client's session timeout (in milliseconds). The client is disconnected, and as a result, all locks released, if a heartbeat is not sent in the timeout.
